item.title: Gitlab
item.description: gitlab docker-compose 配置文件 # 在工作目录下创建 docker-compose.yml 文件，编辑以下内容 version: "3" services: gitlab: image: 'gitlab/gitlab-ce:latest' restart: always container_name: gitlab ports: - '80:80' volumes: - '/docker/software/gitlab/config:/etc/gitlab' - '/docker/software/gitlab/logs:/var/log/gitlab' - '/docker/software/gitlab/data:/var/opt/gitlab' environment: TZ: 'Asia/Shanghai' GITLAB_OMNIBUS_CONFIG: | external_url 'http://127.0.0.1:80' # Add any other gitlab.rb configuration here, each on its own line gitlab_rails['gitlab_ssh_host'] = '127.0.0.1' # gitlab_rails['gitlab_shell_ssh_port'] = 26013 初始密码 /docker/software/gitlab/config/initial_root_password 查找(docker 挂载出来的路径)
